entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
